FrontMatter.title: First Principles Thinking
FrontMatter.description: Explains the basics of first principles thinking, a problem-solving approach that breaks down complex issues into fundamental elements for deeper understanding.
FrontMatter.creator: Martin Hinshelwood

card.title: First Principles Thinking
card.content: Apply First Principles Thinking to break down complex problems and find innovative solutions by understanding the fundamental truths.

FrontMatter.title: Market Focus
FrontMatter.description: Explains how to adjust projects quickly in response to user feedback, focusing on implementing changes within timelines of less than one month.
FrontMatter.creator: Martin Hinshelwood

card.content: Discover more about Market Focus and how it can help you in your Agile journey!
card.title: Market Focus

BodyContent: Update the work based on user feedback on timelines shorter than one month

FrontMatter.title: Self-Organization
FrontMatter.description: Explains how Scrum teams manage their own work, make collaborative decisions, and rely on a Scrum Master for guidance and process support.
FrontMatter.creator: Martin Hinshelwood

card.content: Discover more about Self-Organization and how it can help you in your Agile journey!
card.title: Self-Organization

BodyContent: Self-Organization: [Scrum]({{< ref "/categories/scrum" >}}) teams are self-organizing, which means they have the autonomy to determine how to achieve their goals. The team members collaborate and make decisions together, and the [Scrum Master]({{< ref "/tags/scrum-master" >}}) helps to facilitate and guide the process

FrontMatter.title: Value-based Prioritization
FrontMatter.description: Explains how to prioritise product backlogs by stakeholder value, guiding Scrum teams to focus on high-impact tasks and balance value creation with revenue goals.
FrontMatter.creator: Martin Hinshelwood

card.content: Discover more about Value-based Prioritization and how it can help you in your Agile journey!
card.title: Value-based Prioritization

BodyContent:
Value-based Prioritization: Focus on delivering value to the stakeholders. The [product backlog]({{< ref "/tags/product-backlog" >}}) is prioritized based on the value it delivers, and the [Scrum]({{< ref "/categories/scrum" >}}) team works on the highest-priority items first.

## Value Creation vs Revenue Extraction

FrontMatter.title: Empirical Process Control
FrontMatter.description: A method that uses transparency, regular inspection, and adaptation to guide teams and stakeholders in achieving goals and improving processes.
FrontMatter.creator: Martin Hinshelwood

card.content: Discover more about Empirical Process Control and how it can help you in your Agile journey!
card.title: Empirical Process Control

BodyContent: [Empirical Process Control]({{< ref "/tags/empirical-process-control" >}}): [Scrum]({{< ref "/categories/scrum" >}}) is an empirical process that relies on [transparency]({{< ref "/tags/transparency" >}}), inspection, and adaptation. It means that the [Scrum team]({{< ref "/tags/scrum-team" >}}) and stakeholders should be transparent about the work, inspect the progress regularly, and adapt the plan as necessary to achieve the desired outcomes.

FrontMatter.title: Emergant Work
FrontMatter.description: Improves work processes by incorporating user feedback and making updates within timelines shorter than one month for faster, responsive results.
FrontMatter.creator: Martin Hinshelwood

card.content: Discover more about Emergant Work and how it can help you in your Agile journey!
card.title: Emergant Work

BodyContent: Update the work based on user feedback on timelines shorter than one month

FrontMatter.title: Emergant Practices
FrontMatter.description: Explores how effective processes, practices, and tools naturally develop through hands-on work and collaboration in evolving environments.
FrontMatter.creator: Martin Hinshelwood

card.content: Discover more about Emergant Practices and how it can help you in your Agile journey!
card.title: Emergant Practices

BodyContent: Processes, practices and tools necessary will emerge as we do the work and help others do it

FrontMatter.title: Innovation
FrontMatter.description: Explore the concept of innovation, including its definition, importance, and impact on progress across industries. Content will be available soon.
FrontMatter.creator: Martin Hinshelwood

card.title: Innovation
card.content: Encourage Innovation by creating an environment where new ideas and approaches are explored to solve challenges and create value.
